name: InterventionForPositiveFoodInsecurityScreen
title: Intervention for Positive Food Insecurity Screen
description: This is a subset of Gravity value set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1247.11 for use with ASN/SDOH measures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for intervention following a positive screen for food insecurity.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes

contains.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes
